name: Alex Johnson
professional_summary: A highly skilled and experienced NetDevOps Engineer with a passion for automating network infrastructure and improving network reliability.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Networking

responsibilities: Automated network configuration and deployment using Ansible and Python.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for network infrastructure changes.
Monitored network performance and troubleshoot issues using tools like Prometheus and Grafana.
Collaborated with development teams to integrate network services into applications.
